derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from con- 'together' + Latin urbs, urb- 'city' + -ation

entry.tran: (有卫星城镇的)大都市圈，集合城市
entry.def: A conurbation consists of a large city together with the smaller towns around it.

example.ex: ...London and all the other major conurbations.
example.tran: 伦敦和所有其他的大都市圈

means.word_mean: 1. an aggregation or continuous network of urban communities

auth_sentence.content: It's a huge, sprawling, dusty conurbation that's growing explosively, absorbing the overflow of people from nearby Nairobi.

auth_sentence.content: The government will also allow local authorities who work together to have their own "conurbation mayor" should they want one.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government will also allow local authorities who work together to have their own "conurbation mayor" should they want one.

auth_sentence.content: The city claims, with good reason, to be the oldest continuously inhabited conurbation on Earth.
